snippet.title: Lightning Katana | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page (with demo): https://store.steampowered.com/app/3162850/Lightning_Katana/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/XGWWVCHrrP
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BurnoutsGuy

Launching Feb 18th 2025!

A fast-paced action FPS with hype parries, and even faster beats inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami, Katana Zero, and Devil May Cry.

Slash, Parry, Shoot and dodge roll your way through the Neo-Nippon Yakuza to avenge your pet Dogsuke and bring them down!
